oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Local paper. Ms. imperfect, later folios missing, paper brittle in poor condition; ff. 1, 2 and 114 damaged.
Written in black ink, 10-15 lines per page; ff. 2r-72v have ruled borders for demarcating text area.
Pamphlet binding, single section sewn through fold, square paper guards on inside fold; covers missing.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Arabic and Gujarati in Khojki script.
